ently.

en I have a few jobs running in 3.0? 

When Heritrix process is killed, wha=
t happen if BdbShutdownHook is executed partially? 

We do not care about l=
osing a few hours of crawled URLs because of no checkpointing. We just want=
 to make sure no BDB corruption. Can we kill the process without any BDB sy=
ncing (checkpointing) and executing BdbShutdownHook ? Everything in memory =
will be lost but we do not care. Again, we want to restart the crawler from=
 a good checkpoint.

Thank you in advance.
